physical_appearance:The image shows a colour photograph. It depicts an image of a woman. She is bespectacled and wearing a cheongsam that is sleeveless which ends below the knees. She is also sitting down on a bench and holding onto its handrails. She is facing the direction where the photograph was captured
 but her eyes are closed. The background of the photograph suggests that the picture was taken in the interior of a building.
subject_terms_1:portraits women (female humans) folk costume
subject_terms_2:Colour photography Portrait photography Women Qipao Peranakan (Asian people)
subject_terms_3:Portrait photography Women Chinese costumes
sgcool_label_text:This photograph shows Mrs Lee Choon Guan née Tan Teck Neo (1877 - 1978) in a cheongsam. She is seated on a mother-of-pearl bench
 at her home
 Mandalay Villa. Printed underneath the image along the border is ‘Mar 63’.
